titleStmt.title: The grievances represented by the Estates of Scotland, to the King's Majesty, to be redressed in Parliament together with His Majesties instructions to his commissioner, for redressing the same.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.
Scotland. Convention of Estates.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London, and re-printed at Edinburgh,

notesStmt.note: The instructions of King William to the Duke of Hamilton for the establishment of the new government in Scotland are dated successively May 31, July 4, and July 17, 1689.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
